http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/KOS/00057054/management and operational support to kosovo institutions PRODOC2011.pdf

donor_name: PROVISIONAL INSTITUTIONS OF SELF GOVERNMENT IN KOSOVO
outputs.output_descr: This umbrella project for Management and Operational Support to Kosovo Institutions is designed to provide a framework for facilitation of provision of expertise and assistance of management and operational nature to the institutions in Kosovo.

project_descr: This project for Management and Operational Support to Kosovo Institutions is designed to provide an experts assistance of management and operational nature (as opposed to capacity development) to the institutions in Kosovo.
project_title: Management & Operational Support for Kosovo Institutions
